message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this great product. I'm thinking $115 would be fair, what do you think?
I appreciate your time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, and I'm willing to be flexible. How about $105? It's still a good price for you, and I'm happy to meet you halfway.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $102.50
